name: Fall Harvest Festival
description: Join us for the annual Fall Harvest Festival at the County Fairgrounds. Enjoy a day of family-friendly activities, pumpkin carving, hayrides, and delicious seasonal treats. Fun for all ages!

name: Beach Cleanup Day
description: Help protect our oceans and beaches by participating in our Beach Cleanup Day at Oceanfront Park. Gloves, bags, and refreshments will be provided. Let's work together to keep our coastlines clean and beautiful!

name: Winter Wonderland Market
description: Experience the magic of the holiday season at our Winter Wonderland Market in Downtown Square. Browse festive stalls offering handmade gifts, seasonal treats, and warm beverages. A magical shopping experience for the whole family!

name: Spring Flower Festival
description: Welcome spring with a burst of color at our Spring Flower Festival in the Botanical Gardens. Explore beautiful floral displays, attend gardening workshops, and enjoy live music and entertainment. A blooming good time for nature lovers!

name: Art in the Park
description: Immerse yourself in creativity at Art in the Park, a showcase of local artists and their works in Central Park. Stroll through the art stalls, meet the artists, and enjoy live demonstrations. An inspiring day for art enthusiasts!
